description: 4x4 grid, uniform 16m height, 16m street width, concrete buildings, asphalt ground.
primary_analysis_focus: Establish reference for fluxes, temperatures, and comfort metrics.
details: Dense mix of mid-rise buildings; concrete construction; no trees.

primary_analysis_focus: Impact of Aspect Ratio, Sky View Factor (SVF), shading, and wind flow on canyon climate.
details: Dense mix of tall buildings; concrete construction; no trees.

primary_analysis_focus: Impact of Aspect Ratio, SVF, and increased solar access.

description: Building Alignment: Aligned grid -> Staggered grid
primary_analysis_focus: Changes in wind channeling, ventilation, and turbulence within the urban fabric.
Effect of albedo on surface temperature, radiation balance (Q∗), and stored heat (ΔQS).

description: Street Material: Asphalt -> Mix of concrete pavement, grass verges, and soil areas.
primary_analysis_focus: Combined effects of albedo and evapotranspiration (QE) on the energy balance.
representative_LCZ: LCZ 5 (Open Mid-Rise with increased pervious surface)
details: Open arrangement of mid-rise buildings with abundant green spaces.

description: Building Walls: Add green walls to all building facades.
primary_analysis_focus: Cooling from evapotranspiration and shading directly on building surfaces.

description: Building Roofs: Convert all roofs to extensive green roofs.
primary_analysis_focus: Impact of evapotranspiration, increased thermal mass, and insulation on roofs.

description: Vegetation: Add deciduous trees, simulated for leaf-off (winter) conditions.
primary_analysis_focus: Assess the impact of woody elements on wind and radiation without foliage evapotranspiration.

description: Vegetation: Add a row of evergreen trees along the streets.
primary_analysis_focus: Comparison of year-round shading and microclimate impact vs. deciduous tree structure.

description: Water Body: Add an active misting/spray system in the central plaza.
primary_analysis_focus: Intensive, localized evaporative cooling; impact on air temperature and humidity.

description: Water Body: Add a shallow water pond in the central plaza.
primary_analysis_focus: Cooling from evaporation and the effect of water's high thermal inertia on diurnal temperature swing.
representative_LCZ: LCZ 5 (with LCZ G - Water feature [only if very large])

description: Combines S2.2 (Green Street), S3.2 (Green Roofs), and S4.2 (Evergreen Trees).
primary_analysis_focus: Analyzing the synergistic impact of combined measures (Intensive Green Infrastructure).

description: Combines S2.1 (Cool Pavement) and S5.1 (Misting System).
primary_analysis_focus: Analyzing the synergistic impact of combined measures (Technology-focused mitigation).

description: Combines S1.3 (Staggered Layout), S2.2 (Green Street), and S4.2 (Evergreen Trees).
